dmca.title: [ABUSE] www.tibla.com/home
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 16, 2005 10:21 AM
To: schneider@cipsoft.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] www.tibla.com/home

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Nicole Schneider <schneider@cipsoft.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Wednesday, February 16, 2005, 3:52:04 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] www.tibla.com/home

===8<==============Original message text===============
February 16, 2005


Dear Sirs and Madams:

The internet address www.tibla.com/home is assigned to your address area.

Apart from the fact that this side offends against the copyright rules
of our official web side www.tibia.com, this reproduction of our web
side is used to obtain secret account data from our customers.

We ask you to remove the side www.tibla.com/home immediately from the
internet.

For further questions please feel free to contact me via email.

Yours sincerely,

Nicole Schneider
CipSoft GmbH




===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCE3L3vK/XpJs6oyURAn8zAKCs5pGRA059D3T0fzt8bpo8btpoGACdHnDS
Ykv69SzK7nhGYX3yzsg+DiI=
=GB5k
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
